title: Kukushka / The Cuckoo / Kki [It's a russian movie.]
content:
Anyone seen this film?

I saw it today. First I thought that it isn't probably very good, but well, let's see.. But I was surprised that it wasn't what I expected, it was actually quite good movie. It's about some Finnish, Russian and Lapp, and the war over here in 1944 has just ended (or actually will end during the movie).
Anyways, I suggest it to everyone who want to see beautiful Lappland landscapes.

Here's IMDB entry;
[url=http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0308476/]www.imdb.com/title/tt0308476/[/url]You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Kukushka / The Cuckoo / Kki
content: Come on! This film has won at least 50 awards on film festivals.. Nobody has heard about it?!You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Kukushka / The Cuckoo / Kki
content: It sounds interesting, but I haven't seen it. Actually, I don't think I've watched a movie for quite a long time.

title: Re: Kukushka / The Cuckoo / Kki
content: Sorry... Here in America, we are sheltered from the world of non-big-budget hollywood schlock.*** ---   I Am Keen is hell bent for leather.  Are you?   --- ***
